name: Lucky Lion
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Lucky Lion is aiming to become the world's first community led GameFi platform built on Binance Smart Chain, we reward our loyal user-base by letting them earn up to 9% revenue share of the booming iGaming market that is expected to reach $127.3 Billion USD by 2027, at a compounding annual rate of 11.5%.
